mapper.sql: id, s_type, oms_order_id, work_order_id, item_id, item_num, item_no, item_model, item_name, item_brand, item_origin, item_notes, accessories, qty, unit, currency_name, buy_price, hg_price, customs_code, item_elements, control_ma, hk_control, is_ciq, ciq_type, ciq_code, packing_type, packages, pallets, gw, nw, cbm, shipping_m, pn, bn, ctns_no, item_size, is_function, is_hg_tax, appoint_hg_tax, hg_tax, consume_tax, tlx_tax, item_brand_type, export_discounts, use_to, district_code, orig_place_code, org_id, tenant_id, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted, deleted_user_id, delete_user_name
mapper.update: UPDATE oms_order_entry SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0
